Articles.Content:
After lurked here for some weeks, I decided myself to start posting here, after recreated my previous forum account.

I got KSP when it was available on Steam and I loved from the first day and got addicted

At this moment, I mapped Kerbin with ISA Mapsat, landed an automatic lander on Mun, first manned orbit at Minmus, and I hope to get first manned landing on Mun soon when I figured some issues on my launcher with heavy payload.
